ygData.subject: Resist rates...
ygData.msgSnippet: I played for a while at lunch (got level 26!  YAY!) and I d have to agree with whoever posted that the resist rates have gone up.  I was fighting blue gobs in
ygData.messageBody:
I played for a while at lunch (got level 26! YAY!) and I'd have to agree
with whoever posted that the resist rates have gone up. I was fighting
blue gobs in Perma, and they were resisting my chains 3 out of 4 attempts.
They were resisting discord 1 out of 2 attempts. This has NEVER happend
before. I have been playing in perma for the last week, and this is a
definite change. This was BEFORE I got my level btw, just to remove any
excess variables.

Steven S. Klug
-- sklug@...
